elements.description: Check if Sign in with Apple is available (iOS 13+).

elements.description: Get the credential state of a user.

elements.description: Show the Sign in with Apple UI

elements.description: Authorization for the given user has been revoked.
elements.name: STATE_REVOKED

elements.description: The system hasn’t determined whether the user might be a real person.
elements.name: STATUS_UNKNOWN

elements.description: The system can’t determine this user’s status as a real person.
elements.name: STATUS_UNSUPPORTED

elements.description: The user appears to be a real person.
elements.name: STATUS_LIKELY_REAL
